original_title: Kordavision: The man who shot Che Guevara
overview: Alberto Díaz Korda delivered intense photography experiences throughout his 40-year career. KordaVision traces this brilliant career from his beginning in Havana, Cuba, until he became Fidel Castro's personal photographer from 1959 through 1968.
title: Kordavision: The man who shot Che Guevara
